subject: Re: [cc-devel] My SoC project was accepted!
body:
On Thu, 2007-04-12 at 01:15 -0300, Alan Kelon Oliveira de Moraes wrote:
> Hi!
> 
> The subject says it all :) I'm very happy to be with you in the next
> months. Thank you for all involved in the selection process. Congrats to
> Cassio, Jason and Matthias too!
> 
> I'll publish random status on http://alankelon.wordpress.com. Nathan, how
> do we go on from now?
> 
> Best regards,

Actually, please use the CC techblog. And/or cross-blog :)

Jon
